entry.title: Armenia lifts entry ban on 2 diaspora community leaders

media:group.media:title: Armenia lifts entry ban on 2 diaspora community leaders
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia‚Äôs top diplomat called Azerbaijani President Ilham Aliyev‚Äôs latest claims against the country a ‚Äúsetback‚Äù in ongoing peace efforts. üìçThe European Union‚Äôs foreign policy chief has warned Azerbaijan of ‚Äúsevere consequences‚Äù for any future incursions into Armenia. üìçThe United States remains committed to mediating peace talks between Armenia and Azerbaijan, according to a State Department spokesperson. üìçTwo community leaders in the Armenian diaspora who were barred from entering Armenia have had their bans lifted after suing.
Credits: Ruptly

entry.title: Armenia ‚Äúmostly‚Äù resolves delayed arms shipment issues with Russia

media:group.media:title: Armenia ‚Äúmostly‚Äù resolves delayed arms shipment issues with Russia
media:group.media:description:
üìçThe government plans to introduce a mandatory health insurance system, saying it will improve the quality of healthcare in Armenia. üìçFrance‚Äôs newly appointed foreign minister has signaled his country‚Äôs ‚Äúcontinued support‚Äù for Armenia in his first public remarks on the matter since his appointment earlier this month. üìçThe outstanding problems Armenia has with delayed arms shipments from Russia have mostly been resolved, though a number of issues still remain. üìçBusiness Week Armenia: https://youtu.be/AKKX-V1P_O8

entry.title: What is required to invest in innovative projects #shorts

media:group.media:title: What is required to invest in innovative projects #shorts
media:group.media:description:
In this episode, we explore the life of Armen Kherlopian, Ph.D., a scientist, researcher, angel investor, and advisor to the board of several prominent corporations. We discuss the relevance of artificial intelligence, data sciences, and innovations for tomorrow. With a background in biomedical engineering and biophysics, we assess how Dr. Kherlopian entered the world of entrepreneurship, investments, and startups and how he makes sense of a world increasingly dependent on machine learning. Finally, we explore Dr. Kherlopian‚Äôs historical and family legacies from Aintab and Marash, which have been pivotal in his successes and mission to push boundaries in tech and sciences and contribute to the betterment of our world. Watch full interview: https://youtu.be/j6kQD8148TQ

entry.title: Armenian government to invest $37M in ‚Äòdry port‚Äô project: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS

media:group.media:title: Armenian government to invest $37M in ‚Äòdry port‚Äô project: THIS WEEK IN BUSINESS
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia plans to invest $37 million to set up a large industrial park and special economic zone in the country‚Äôs second largest city of Gyumri. üìçArmenia took a 12.5% stake in the company behind a long-stalled gold mining project embroiled in environmental controversy. üìçArmenia scrapped a program subsidizing the cost of transporting goods to Russia via the Black Sea, citing insufficient demand. üìçArmenia will loan more than $8.5 million to the company behind a planned scrap metal plant that relocated away from a border village after repeated shelling from Azerbaijan.

media:group.media:title: In Yerevan, EU & NATO representatives respond to Aliyev‚Äôs statements
media:group.media:description:
üìçArmenia raises the alarm to EU and NATO representatives about Azerbaijani President Aliyev's "destructive statements.‚Äù üìçPrime Minister Pashinyan believes Armenia needs a new Constitution to make it ‚Äúmore competitive and more viable in the new geopolitical and regional conditions.‚Äù üìçRussian ambassador to Armenia says there are no plans to withdraw from the military base in Gyumri. üìçA bipartisan group of US Congressmen issued condemnation of recent remarks by Aliyev refusing to pull back troops from positions it occupies inside Armenia. üìçHrant Dink: A Legacy of Hope - https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/762118/hrant-dink-a-legacy-of-hope/ and Towards the Future with Hrant Dink - https://www.civilnet.am/en/news/762075/towards-the-future-with-hrant-dink/
